articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Thanks to Officials and Other People and Service Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Thanks to People, Service Personnel
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday sent a message of thanks to officials and other people and service personnel of the Korean People's Army who made every sincere effort to splendidly spruce up the plaza park of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 The message said that the giant project of splendidly building a park in the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state has been completed with success before the Day of the Sun, the greatest holiday of the nation.
					
					 The plaza park is a large flower garden praying for the immortality of the leaders, a product of the strong sense of moral obligation of the Korean people and service personnel for the Generalissimos. It is also a park built under the warm loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea for the people, it noted.
					
					 The Generalissimos were peerless patriots and people's fathers who adorned the whole course of their noble revolutionary careers with warm love and great dedication to the country and the people, taking the lead in hewing out the path of the grim and arduous revolution of Juche, it stressed.
					
					 The plaza park is not mere product of garden art but the best scenery and socialist fairyland reflecting the gem-like loyalty and sincerity of the army and people of the DPRK to hold the Generalissimos in high esteem in the fragrant flower garden, it stressed.
					
					 Through the project the officials and other people and service personnel clearly showed the whole world how ardent and sincere the minds of the army and people of the DPRK of upholding their leaders are, it said.
					
					 The WPK will always remember the infinite loyalty and sincerity displayed by them in sprucing up the plaza park and they will be brilliantly recorded in the history for realizing the cause of immortalizing the leaders in the era of Songun, it stressed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the message of thanks stressed the need to eternally preserve and more splendidly and perfectly spruce up the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and glorify for all ages the sacred revolutionary history and undying feats of the Generalissimos as befits the descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed firm belief that all the officials and other people and service personnel would get united around the party single-mindedly, greet the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War with a high degree of political enthusiasm and proud labor feats and glorify the new century of the Juche revolution as annals of victory and glory.

articles.title: Meeting to Convey Message of Thanks Sent by Kim Jong Un Held
articles.content:
Meeting to Convey Message of Thanks Sent by Kim Jong Un Held
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting to convey a message of thanks sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un to officials and other people and service personnel of the Korean People's Army who made every sincere effort to splendidly spruce up the plaza park of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun took place at the plaza on Tuesday.
					 With the approach of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President), the plaza turned into a huge flower garden symbolic of immortality of the leaders thanks to the strong sense of obligation and loyalty of the army and people of the DPRK to eternally hold President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem 
					
					 Officials of the Cabinet, commissions, ministries and national institutions, Pyongyang City and provincial people's committees and other people and servicepersons did such huge work as laying ground for the park, building facilities and planting turf, flowers and trees at the best level in a short span of time.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of the party and armed forces organs, Cabinet, commissions, ministries and national institutions, officials of party and power bodies in provinces, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and people in different parts of the country.
					
					 The message of thanks sent by Kim Jong Un was conveyed by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly who is also member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Then speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers renewed their determination to display gem-like loyalty to the work for devotedly defending the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and sprucing it up more beautifully, bearing in mind the honor and trust reposed by Kim Jong Un in them.

articles.title: 7th Congress of KCU to Be Convened
articles.content:
7th Congress of KCU to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League decided to convene the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) early in June.
					 The congress will discuss the tasks to be carried out by the KCU to remain true to the idea and leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as required by the new historic era of accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: 28th National Scientific and Technological Festival Closes
articles.content:
28th National Scientific, Technological Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The 28th National Scientific and Technological Festival closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition Tuesday.
					 The festival has been under way since April 23. Presented to the festival were more than 530 pieces of scientific and technological achievements which proved successful at the festivals of ministries and national institutions, Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned, scientists, technicians, three-revolution team members and other people.
					
					 The results of the festival were announced by the jury at the closing ceremony.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways, Taedonggang Tile Factory, Faculty of Metal Engineering of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Ryongsong Meat Processing Factory and the Information and Communication Department of the Posts and Telecommunication Management Bureau in North Phyongan Province took special places.
					
					 16 units including the Nanotechnology Institute of Kim Il Sung University came first and Paek Un Chol, researcher of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Kwang Chol, director of the Central Information and Communications Center, and 12 others placed first.
					
					 North Phyongan Province took the first place in the exhibition contest and the Center for Development of Solar Heating Equipment occupied the special place in the contest for exchange of new technologies. 
					
					 The prize of scientific and technical merit went to the Uiju Foodstuff Factory in North Phyongan Province, Munchon Foodstuff Factory of Kangwon Province, Fermentation Research Institute of the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science and the Center for Lighting Research.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Tuesday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador said that thanks to the wise leadership of the President, the Korean people could achieve progress and prosperity, foiling threats and blackmails of the hostile forces and their moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He said that the wishes of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il would successfully come true thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He noted that Iran would as ever support the Korean people in their efforts to protect the sovereignty of the country and revolutionary gains and reunify Korea.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech noted that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties provided by the President with top leaders of Iran are growing stronger as the days go by.
					
					 He extended firm support and solidarity to the government and people of Iran in their struggle to protect the right to nuclear activities for peaceful purposes and build a strong Islamic state, standing firm against the pressure of the U.S. and the West.
					
					 He noted that the feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in developing the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran and accomplishing the human cause of independence will go down in history.

articles.title: National Seminar on WPK's New Strategic Line Held
articles.content:
National Seminar on WPK's New Strategic Line Held
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Workers' Party of Korea's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force took place at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, officials of the party and administration bodies and working people's organizations in Pyongyang, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, media and preservation of revolutionary relics and those of party cadre training institutions.
					
					 Presented at the seminar were papers proving the originality, scientific nature, truth and vitality of the line set forth at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Yun U Chol, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, said that the original line put forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un is the most scientific and revolutionary strategy and an immortal great programme which indicates the path of final victory. The nuclear force of the DPRK has grown to be a nuclear treasure of justice with higher comprehensive performance and the building of nuclear force has been laid down as a lasting revolutionary strategy, he noted, adding that the DPRK has thus emerged a power making a breach in the structure of world politics centered on nuclear powers and steering the international political trend.
					
					 Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, said that the validity of the line lies in that it helps remarkably strengthen war deterrent for self-defence to win the final victory in the all-out action against the U.S. and ensures the maximum effect in developing the national economy and bolstering defence capabilities to suit the specific conditions of the DPRK, adding: The line is a brilliant inheritance and development of the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economy and defence upbuilding which was laid down and had been thoroughly applied by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Vice-Premier Jon Sung Hun underscored the need to put bigger spurs to the struggle to build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living by devotedly implementing the WPK's new line.
					
					  Jang Yun Gon, director of the International Affairs Institute, noted that the strategy for building defence capabilities with nuclear force as the mainstay is a declaration of the stand of the DPRK that it would never abandon nuclear weapons and is an invincible revolutionary strategy which demonstrated the will of the great Paektusan nation to dynamically advance along the fastest way of prosperity while bolstering the country's defence capabilities in every way.
					
					 Cha Yong Myong, director of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, said that the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the WPK marked a historic meeting which put the independent dignity and position of the DPRK on the highest level and provided the landmark turn in bringing earlier the final victory of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Message of Thanks of WPK Central Committee Conveyed to Crewmen of Trading Cargo Ship
articles.content:
Message of Thanks of WPK Central Committee Conveyed to Crewmen of Trading Cargo Ship
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The crewmen of trading cargo ship Jinmyong successfully ensured the 100th voyage of trading cargo transport out of ardent love for the socialist homeland. 
					 They honored the plan for cargo transport every year despite adverse conditions in rough seas.
					
					 A message of thanks of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was sent to its crewmen.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the message of thanks took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, crewmen of the cargo ship and officials of the Ministry of Foreign Trade.

articles.title: North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association Inaugurated
articles.content:
N. Hwanghae Provincial Committee of DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association took place in Sariwon on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Ri Hak Chol, vice-chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Manibadrakh Ganbold and staff members of his embassy here.
					
					 The chairman, vice-chairmen and members of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the association were elected at the ceremony.
					
					 Speakers expressed their will to contribute to boosting the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations as expected by the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the Folklore Street in Sariwon City.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Ethiopian President Girma Wolde-Giorgis on April 24. 
					 In the message the president extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the people and the government of the DPRK on behalf of the people and the government of Ethiopia and on his own on the occasion of the 101st anniversary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He sincerely reaffirmed once again that the cooperation between the two countries would develop in the future.
					
					 He wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the friendly people of the DPRK lasting peace and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Players Grab Gold Medals at Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Grab Gold Medals at Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship 
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK players Jong Kum Hwa and Kim Hye Song bagged gold medals at the 8th Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship. 
					 The championship held in Kazakhstan from April 27 to 29 brought together at least 60 men and women players from the DPRK, China, Kazakhstan, Iran and other countries and regions. 
					
					 Jong Kum Hwa and Kim Hye Song presented diverse and peculiar movements requiring high techniques in women's duet etude, emerging winners. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Chol Song and Kim Yu Gyong won silver medals in mixed duet etude.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Close
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Close
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games closed with due ceremony at Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Tuesday. The games were opened on April 2 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The April 25 Sports Team came first in women's football event, men and women's basketball and volleyball, men's first class group table-tennis and men and women's first class boxing. 
					
					 The Rimyongsu Sports Team placed first in men's football, women's  handball and women's first class group table tennis.
					
					 Men players of the Ryongnamsan Sports Team (Group A) proved successful in the handball games while players of the Moranbong Sports Team in Pyongyang in the softball games. Men players of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and women players of the Sports Team of Kanggye University of Education No. 1 came first in the ice hockey games.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Hypocritical Talk about Dialogue
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Hypocritical Talk about Dialogue
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Voices that the DPRK's stand is unacceptable are heard from among high-ranking officials of the U.S. after a statement was issued by the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 A spokesman for the White House in a press conference on April 18 claimed that the U.S. is still keen to "have trustworthy and sincere negotiations with north Korea" but it has not shown any sincere approach toward its dismantlement of nukes. On the same day U.S. secretary of State Kerry said at the Senate meeting that the U.S. cannot accept conditions raised by north Korea, adding that the U.S. can start negotiations with north Korea only when it makes a bold decision to dismantle its nukes.
					
					 The U.S. hypocritical talk about dialogue is nothing but rhetoric for confrontation with the DPRK as it is aimed to evade the blame for the tension on the Korean Peninsula and carry out its policy for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The tension on the peninsula is bringing consequences contrary to what the U.S. intended. Upset by this, it proposed dialogue to the DPRK on April 11. It was so arrogant that it asserted dialogue is possible only when the DPRK stops "provocative" remarks and show its will to realize denuclearization and halt the missile launch, to begin with.
					
					 Such outbursts as terming the just countermeasures taken by the army and people of the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and rights to live and develop provocations can be mouthed only by the hostile forces blinded by the ambition to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the U.S. has persisted in the moves to ignite a war and apply sanctions against the DPRK, an invulnerable fortress standing against the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia for several decades.
					
					 The U.S. sanctions and frantic war exercises against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence have reached the height in their aggressive and ferocious nature.
					
					 The escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula is entirely attributable to the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can cover up its sinister scenario by talking about dialogue though it is the arch criminal who drove the situation to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The situation goes to prove that most just is the stand of the DPRK which calls for an immediate halt to the hostile forces' anti-DPRK provocations and their moves for a nuclear war, assurances against the recurrence of such actions and a total withdrawal of the U.S. nuclear strike means.
					
					 The U.S. should stop talking about hypocritical dialogue and explicitly choose between war and peace.

articles.title: DPRK Will Always Remain True to Its Principle: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Will Always Remain True to Its Principle: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are keenly aware of the danger of the U.S. nuclear war at a time when the Foal Eagle joint military exercises have reached their height in south Korea.
					 U.S. super-large nuclear carrier groups with nuclear warheads aboard, B-52, B-2 and other strategic bombers, nuclear-powered submarines, guided-missile destroyer groups, F-22 stealth fighters formation and other nuclear strike means are operating against the DPRK. U.S. and south Korean warmongers are busy staging combined landing drill, joint coastal amphibious logistic drill, emergency runway taking-off and landing drill, increasing the danger of their provocations. Commenting on this situation, even foreign media reported that the probability of the outbreak of a war on the Korean Peninsula is 80 percent.
					
					 The U.S. and other warmongers do not want detente on the peninsula even a bit but are keen to ignite a nuclear war at any cost.
					
					 The increasing military threat and dangerous saber-rattling go to clearly prove who is the arch criminal escalating the tension on the peninsula and bringing a nuclear war disaster to it.
					
					 The U.S. has not yet drawn a serious lesson from the failure of its hostile policy toward the DPRK that has lasted for over half a century.
					
					 The U.S. started the Korean War to occupy the DPRK in its cradle but sustained a bitter defeat for the first time in its history. It deplored that it fought a war against a wrong rival at a wrong time after the ceasefire in the 1950s. But it is the 21st century.
					
					 The DPRK has grown to be a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and acquired tremendous military capabilities including nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK compelled it to bolster its nuclear deterrent. Now that the U.S. is imposing a nuclear war upon the DPRK, while showing off latest nuclear hardware, the latter is left with no option but to cope with it with nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK does not want a war but is not afraid of it either.
					
					 It is the unshakable principle and strategic line of the DPRK to take hold on nuclear shield for self-defence and thus shatter the U.S. ambition to annex the Korean Peninsula by force of arms and reduce the Korean people to modern type slaves, and firmly protect its idea and social system and the whole wealth of socialism gained at the cost of blood.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready to meet the U.S. political and military challenges and honorably conclude the decades-long confrontation with it.
					
					 It will keep to the road chosen by itself as long as there persist the U.S. hostile acts against it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Truth behind Nuclear Crisis on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Truth behind Nuclear Crisis on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The responsibility for bringing the biggest danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula in history rests with the U.S., which has desperately pursued its hostile policy to stifle the DPRK, blinded by the ambition to dominate the world, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentator's article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 World media are commenting in their own ways on the serious issues concerning the grave situation close to the brink of a nuclear war. In order to probe the truth behind the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula it is necessary to grasp the essence of the Korean problem.
					
					 The Korean problem which was spawned by the U.S. occupation of south Korea and has remained unsettled for more than six decades represents a pressing international issue, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The true colors of the U.S. are an aggressor and south Korea is a colony under its occupation. The Korean issue is, in essence, the one of showdown between the DPRK, a victim of the aggressors, and the U.S. imperialists who invaded Korea. 
					
					 It is the strategic scenario of the U.S. policy makers to invade the DPRK by every method and means, seize the areas along Rivers Amnok and Tuman as a bridgehead and invade China and Russia to put vast areas of Eurasia under its control.
					
					 The U.S. authorities are putting spurs to carrying out the policy toward the DPRK and their Asian strategy to dominate the world by covering up their centuries-old ambition for aggression. 
					
					 The U.S. is busy labeling the DPRK's legitimate and just steps for self-defence unjust ones in a bid to justify its moves for aggression.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. that escalated the showdown with the DPRK into nuclear confrontation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists attempted more than once to use A-bombs against the Korean people as early as in the period of the Korean War. It has massively introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea since it suffered an ignominious defeat in the Korean War.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to have access to nuclear weapons to cope with the U.S. adventurous moves for a nuclear war and defend the security of the nation and peace on the Korean Peninsula and in other parts of Asia.
					
					 It has become clear that the U.S. imperialists have no intention to drop their hostile policy to stifle the DPRK in a bid to disarm it and bring down its social system by every means and method. Hence, the DPRK set forth the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and codified the line.
					
					 The DPRK will counter the U.S. DPRK policy of aggression backed by nuclear weapons by implementing the new strategic line with nukes as the mainstay and defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the cause of the building of a thriving socialist nation, concludes the article.

articles.title: Nuclear Deterrence Guarantees Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nuclear Deterrence Guarantees Sovereignty: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un clarified in the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea that the DPRK's nuclear deterrence is a means of justice for defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation, averting a war and safeguarding peace.
					 A bylined article of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says that this is a valuable teaching that specified the position held by the nuclear deterrence in safeguarding the security of the country and the nation and stepping up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The U.S. lorded it over in the international arena in the past by dint of the "nuclear advantages", the article says, and goes on:
					
					 In the new century, the U.S. instigated the Central Intelligence Agency to massively spread the story of Iraq's "possession of weapons of mass destruction". In the end, it invaded and put under its control the country in disregard of the UN.
					
					 Those countries which styled themselves big powers failed to check the serious infringement on independence of a sovereign country and the life and security of the people by imperialist forces.
					
					 The U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices have turned the world into a theatre where injustice stalks.
					
					 The nuclear-armed U.S. anti-DPRK moves can be foiled only with nukes and if one is possessed of powerful nuclear deterrence, one has nothing to be afraid of and can concentrate efforts on economic construction and improvement of people's living standard. This is a conclusion we have drawn.
					
					 The WPK laid out the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. This is the most just option in line with the requirements under the prevailing situation.
					
					 The DPRK will further spur the building of nuclear force and keep directing big efforts into economic construction based on it and thus build a thriving nation where people lead wealth and luxury under socialism, concludes the article.

articles.title: U.S. Double-dealing Tactics under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Double-dealing Tactics under Fire 
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. introduced Osprey into south Korea for the Foal Eagle joint military exercises in the wake of its amassing of seven nuclear-powered submarines in waters off Guam, a strategic vantage point of the U.S. forces in the Western Pacific.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This brought into bolder relief the U.S. double-dealing tactics.
					
					 The U.S. is not interested in dialogue and negotiations. This is evidenced by the fact that it raised unrealistic and absurd issues as preconditions for dialogue, persistently going ahead with reckless arms buildup.
					
					 The dialogue and negotiations touted by the U.S. ruling quarters are aimed to calm down the strong will and high vigilance of the DPRK as it is reacting to their adventurous moves for a nuclear war with toughest countermeasures, and step up the preparations for it.
					
					 The DPRK urged the U.S. to make a bold decision to withdraw all its nuclear weapons and related facilities from south Korea and its vicinity and abandon its attempt to reintroduce them as immediate tasks if it wants dialogue.
					
					 The U.S. is dreaming of new provocations while blatantly challenging the DPRK's warning.
					
					 The U.S. has so far let loose a spate of balderdash that the DPRK is perpetrating "provocations" whenever an opportunity presented itself.
					
					 Dancing to the tune of the U.S., riffraffs are becoming increasingly vocal in the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 But all facts go to prove that the U.S. is the provocateur to ignite a nuclear war while escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula to the maximum.
					
					 The U.S. persistent military provocations would result in escalating the political and military tough measures of the DPRK to cope with them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds U.S., S. Korea Accountable for Extreme Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds U.S., S. Korea Accountable for Extreme Tension on Korean Peninsula 
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The tough-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is entirely attributable to the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities' policy of confrontation with the DPRK and their moves for igniting a war against it, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes in December last year. This sparked off the present tension on the peninsula.
					
					 To cope with the grave situation where the enemies went crazy with provocations against the DPRK, outlawing even its satellite launch, it was compelled to conduct its third underground nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					 Kicking up unprecedented confrontation hysteria, the U.S. and other hostile forces cooked up a harsher "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and, at the same time, staged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises with huge armed forces for aggression involved, posing a grave threat to it. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime's reckless racket for confrontation with the DPRK has put the inter-Korean relations in the state of war and operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone to suspension, the worst situation in history. 
					
					 The dialogue touted by the U.S. and the puppet regime is nothing but rhetoric to cover up their criminal act of having pushed the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Working Hard to Bring KIZ to Collapse
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Working Hard to Bring KIZ to Collapse
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The chief of Chongwadae of south Korea held a meeting of the chiefs for diplomatic and security affairs on April 26. At this meeting she said that although a lot of efforts were channeled into putting the operations in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) on a normal basis, the north formally refused to accept a proposal for dialogue, turning down even a request regarding "humanitarian matters," and an indefinite waiting would cost south Korea too much.
					 Echoing her remarks, the chief for security affairs of Chongwadae, puppet ministers of Foreign Affairs, Unification and Defense and the director of the Intelligence Service of south Korea made "a decision" to withdraw all the remaining personnel of the south side from the KIZ.
					
					 The minister of Unification in "the government statement" made such provocative remarks as "difficulties" and "inevitable measures for protecting the security and properties" in an attempt to shift the blame for the grave situation in the KIZ onto the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					  All the facts indicate that the south Korean puppet regime had already in mind a plan to deliberately derail the operations in the KIZ.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that such serious crisis in the KIZ is attributable to the reckless moves of the puppet regime to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is now employing such sleight of hand as "governmental support" in a sinister bid to divert the south Korean people's criticism and censure of it to the DPRK, it says, and goes on:
					
					 However, no one will be fooled by such poor trick.
					
					 The DPRK does not care about whether the puppet regime pulls its personnel out of the KIZ or not. Should the regime brings the KIZ to a total collapse, the nation will never pardon it.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Slammed for Suppressing Human Rights Activist
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Slammed for Suppressing Human Rights Activist
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea, on April 25 denounced the police for cracking down on So Su Yong, an activist of the human rights movement.
					 The police searched So's house in Ryongin, Kyonggi Province that day on charges of violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that he conducted the human rights movement for the release of those in prison and posted articles introducing the DPRK on website.
					
					 The honorary chairman held that it is something unprecedented to crack down on by invoking the fascist law the human rights activist who is devoting himself to the prisoners of conscience, far from awarding a prize to him.
					
					 We cannot remain a passive onlooker to act of double standards such as talking about "dialogue" with the north but in actuality suppressing forces standing for reunification through south-north reconciliation and cooperation, he said. 
					
					 He called upon all civic and public organizations to rise up in the massive action to check the authorities' suppression.

articles.title: Unreasonable Discrimination against Korean Schools in Japan Protested
articles.content:
Unreasonable Discrimination against Korean Schools in Japan Protested
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Protest actions are taking place in different parts of Japan to demand the Japanese government make reparations as regards the exclusion of Korean schools in Japan from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					 A trial was held at the Nagoya local court on April 16 on the basis of the suit filed by students and graduates of Aichi Korean middle and high school.
					
					 They held at the trial that a fair verdict should be made, taking into consideration the feelings of the students of Korean schools who have been subject to discrimination owing to the unreasonable political reason and the historic background of Koreans in Japan including Japan's colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 Lawyer Yoshikazu Uchikawa who was heading the counsel laid bare the discriminating step taken by the Japanese government so far in the matter of applying the above-said program to Korean schools.
					
					 Such step is an encroachment upon human rights enshrined in the Japanese Constitution and it is unconstitutional, he noted.
					
					 Lawyer Akiko Yazaki referred to the historic background of Koreans in Japan, their national education and the illegality of the discrimination against Korean schools in the application of the above-said program. 
					
					 For the students of Korean schools the current suit is not a mere issue of asking for money but an issue of protecting the pride and dignity as Koreans, she said.
					
					 TV installed at the court during the trial showed activities of students of Korean schools during school hours and actions conducted in demand of the application of the program.
					
					 The trial was followed by a meeting.
					
					 Prior to it, a trial was held at the Osaka local court on April 11 in demand of the repayment of subsidies to Koreans schools. The suit was filed against Osaka Prefecture and Osaka city authorities.
					
					 Present there were those concerned of Korean schools and parents of their students and Japanese citizens as observers.
					
					 Open pleadings were made by Japanese lawyers who are attorneys of Osaka Korean School at the trial.
					
					 Quoting the "results of investigation made by experts" in Osaka Prefecture, they said that Korean schools meet the norms for setting up special schools and are in line with study guidelines in education contents and requirements for graduation, etc. and it is hoped that talents would be brought up to play the role of a bridge linking Osaka and Asia through national education.
					
					 They denounced Osaka Prefecture and the Osaka city authorities for refusing to pay subsidies to the Korean school only, talking about "strictness".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on websites of various countries between April 22 and 25 to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "The undying exploits performed in army building adorned with victory and glory" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the cheers of the crowd.
					
					 The President was a prominent military genius and brilliant commander who propounded the Juche-oriented military thought and built invincible revolutionary armed forces, the article noted, and continued: He laid down the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and defence upbuilding and wisely led the work to implement it.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, always working with Kim Il Sung, performed undying exploits in the history of the Juche-oriented army building and fully demonstrated his qualifications and personality as an outstanding brilliant commander in those days.
					
					 The exploits performed by the great Generalissimos in army building are being successfully carried forward thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Group for Solidarity with the DPRK of Russia posted on its website a photo of Kim Jong Un, Korean songs including "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary hymn, and "Song of the Korean People's Army," a documentary film on the event marking the 75th anniversary of the KPA and an article titled "Invincible revolutionary Paektusan army." 
					
					 Highlighted in the Russian internet magazines including Hanber Journal were a photo of Kim Il Sung inspecting units of the KPA and articles including "The great exploits performed for building the revolutionary armed forces".
					
					 The Association for the Promotion between Austria and the DPRK posted on its website an article introducing the road of victory and glory covered by the heroic KPA, which has grown strong to be a matchless army thanks to the great brilliant Songun commanders.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Favored by Russian Figure
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Favored by Russian Figure
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, issued a statement on April 21 in support of the statement of the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Just is the stand taken by the DPRK to cope with the present situation, he said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to take all steps as attempts persisted to pass the buck for all provocations to it.
					
					 The negotiations for peace which the DPRK not only desires but for which it is always ready are possible only when the U.S. and south Korea stop provocations unconditionally.
					
					 The statement of the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission clarified the constructive and firm stand of the DPRK on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to react to the U.S. with nuclear deterrent because the U.S. was the first to introduce nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					
					 The world is well aware of the sinister intention of the U.S., which invaded Yugoslavia, Iraq and Libya on groundless charges and killed their innocent people.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula are directly linked with peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region and, furthermore, in the rest of the world.
					
					 Accordingly, the international public should properly understand the truth about the situation prevailing on the peninsula and cooperate in the efforts to pave the way for peace negotiations.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations in different countries and a regional organization posted on their websites special write-ups interwoven with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos in the period between April 7 and 15 to mark his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 The Romanian Workers' Association posted on its website an article titled "101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people", the Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity an article titled "The struggle of the Korean people's leader, legendary career of President Kim Il Sung" and the Sovetski Centr of Ukraine an article titled "The history's appreciation on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung". They dealt with his sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits.
					
					  The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK said in an article titled "Great thinker and theoretician":
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a distinguished thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea and the Songun idea representing the era of independence.
					
					 He developed and enriched the Juche idea as the guiding idea of the era of independence while leading the revolution and construction for many years.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind as the sun of Juche.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association noted in an article:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a peerless patriot and legendary hero who liberated Korea by leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 He was an iron-willed brilliant commander who beat back the aggression of the U.S. imperialists, defended the sovereignty and independence of the country and turned the DPRK into a power. 
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions also posted on its website articles titled "The eternal sun of Juche" and "Father of the people".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de futbol y se reune con medallistas de oro
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de futbol y se reune con medallistas de oro
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, junto con la camarada Ri Sol Ju, presencio el dia 29 en el Estadio Kim Il Sung la competencia final de futbol masculino de categoria A entre los equipos Rimyongsu y Amnokgang como parte del Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Mangyongdae.
					Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Ki Nam,  Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, Choe Pu Il, Kim Tong Il, los miembros del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales y del sector deportivo, deportistas, aficionados y otros trabajadores de diversos estratos en esta capital.
					
					Los dos equipos demostraron las magnificas escenas poniendo de pleno manifiesto sus habilidades adiestradas en los tiempos ordinarios.
					
					Desde el inicio del partido, el once Rimyongsu tomo la iniciativa y dio sin parar la ofensiva manteniendo bien su intencion tactica.
					
					Con el cabezazo excelente y el chut fuerte, los jugadores del citado equipo marcaron dos goles en el primer tiempo.
					
					En el segundo tiempo, los jugadores de Amnokgang prepararon la oportunidad de marcar el gol con alto manejo de pelota y ofensiva activa.
					
					Al final, el equipo Rimyongsu gano por 2:1.
					
					El Mariscal expreso gran satisfaccion por el hecho de que los jugadores de ambos equipos realizaron en alto nivel la competencia y les felicito el resultado del juego.
					
					Este dia, el Mariscal se reunio con Kim Kum ok, Yang Kyong Il, Ri Se Gwang, Hwang Ryong Hak, Pak Yong Mi, Hong Kuk Hyon, Ri Su Yon, Kwon Yong Gwang y Pak Jong Ju, quienes conquistaron las medallas de oro en los ultimos torneos internacionales, el entrenador Kim Il Sung y funcionarios directivos de deporte.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Choe Pu Il y miembros del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes.
					
					Estrechando uno por uno las manos de los jugadores, entrenador y funcionarios directivos de deporte, el Mariscal evaluo altamente a ellos quienes al salir victoriosos en las recientes competencias internacionales dieron el optimismo y la conviccion en la victoria al ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que aceleran con vigor la construccion del Estado prospero socialista aun en medio de brutal sancion y represion de los enemigos.
					
					Y expuso su conviccion de que los deportistas y entrenadores consolidaran los resultados obtenidos esta vez al sudar mucho en el entrenamiento y seguiran ostentando con medallas de oro el honor de la patria en los juegos internacionales.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Campo de Futbol Yanggakdo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Campo de Futbol Yanggakdo
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, junto con Ri Sol Ju, recorrio el Campo de Futbol Yanggakdo.
					El campo construido en mayo de 1989 en armonia con el hermoso paisaje del islote Yanggak tiene mas de 30 mil asientos.
					
					En el pasado, se realizaron alli muchos juegos nacionales e internacionales, con lo cual el estadio contribuyo a desarrollar el deporte nacional y profundizar las relaciones de amistad con varios paises del mundo.
					
					El Mariscal, quien vino a la cancha con el proyecto de renovarla conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo, fue a la sala de presentacion del historial del campo.
					
					Recordo con emocion las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas para intensificar el deporte del Juche diciendo que esos grandes hombres tomaron parte en la ceremonia inaugural del campo.
					
					Recorriendo varios lugares del campo de deporte, el Mariscal indico las tareas y los remedios detallados que se presentan en su remodelacion.
					
					Senalo que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea tiene el proyecto de convertirlo en una cancha de futbol de uso exclusivo que representara el campo de futbol del pais conforme al requisito del nuevo siglo.
					
					Instruyendo uno por uno el rumbo y los remedios para renovarlo, el Mariscal hizo organizar la poderosa fuerza de construccion capaz de cambiar su fisonomia en un corto plazo de tiempo.
					
					Desarrollar el deporte es una labor importante para intensificar por todos los medios el poderio estatal, ostentar a todo el mundo el indoblegable impetu y la dignidad de la Corea del Songun y hacer que todos los uniformados y civiles aceleren la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista llenos del orgullo y la dignidad nacionales, dijo y manifesto la conviccion de que los dominios concernientes reconstruiran magnificamente el campo de futbol como cancha de uso exclusivo.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil y otros funcionarios de la rama correspondiente.

articles.title: Se convocara en RPDC el VII Congreso de ONC
articles.content:
Se convocara en RPDC el VII Congreso de ONC
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung decidio convocar a principios de junio el VII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea.
					El conclave  discutira las tareas de la ONC para apoyar con fidelidad la idea y la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca historica en aras del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
